name: Radish
description:
Radish is an intense, fast-pace and pretty hardcore shooter game. It is fun, easy to learn and addicting. Defeat the evil radishes, survive countless waves of enemies and break your highscore. Will you be able to make it to the end?

So whats going on?
  • 3 different levels
  • A big selection of different weapons
  • Basically infinte exploding enemies
  • Enemies grow over time
  • Fun game design
  • A fast, intuitive and very addicting gameplay
  • Defeat the stupid vegetables
  • Beat your highscore
  • Survive the radish invasion
